attributes.action: make it illegal to protest against operations oversea's at public parade events when troops are returning home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Armed Forces are ordered to duties oversea's, protestors should not be allowed to disrupt parades and similar events. If people wish to protest then they should do so in places such as outside Parliment, MOD Main Building and other Government buildings.
